properties.areaDesc: Gulf of Mexico including Dry Tortugas and Rebecca Shoal Channel
properties.headline: Special Marine Warning issued January 31 at 6:22PM EST until January 31 at 7:15PM EST by NWS Key West FL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Key West has issued a

* Special Marine Warning for...
Gulf of Mexico including Dry Tortugas and Rebecca Shoal Channel...

* Until 715 PM EST.

* At 621 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from 49 nm northwest of Dry Tortugas Light to 29 nm west
of Tortugas Ecological Reserve North to 30 nm northwest of Tortugas
Ecological Reserve South, moving east at 40 knots.

HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 50 knots and large hail.

SOURCE...Radar.

IMPACT...Expect wind gusts in excess of 50 knots and suddenly
higher waves, boats could sustain significant damage or
capsize.

* Locations in the warning include...
W Tower and Tortugas Ecological Reserve North.
properties.instruction:
Prepare for severe thunderstorms with wind gusts in excess of 50
knots, extremely rough seas, frequent lightning, and torrential
downpours. Be advised that any severe thunderstorm can spawn a
waterspout or tornado. Stay low or go below, and make sure all on
board are wearing life jackets.

Frequent lightning is occurring with these storms. If caught on the
open water, stay low or go below.
